about_the_game:
Welcome to "Fengdu War"

Becoming an immortal is the ultimate goal that every spiritual practitioner dreams of. Legend has it that in the ancient city of Fengdu in the far east, there is a quick secret method that can quickly overcome the tribulation and ascend to the Tao. Spiritual practitioners from all over the world have gone to the ancient city of Fengdu to seek a quick method, striving to achieve Taoism and become immortals, and launched a fierce battle.

Game Content:

  • 3 main characters and their corresponding exclusive cards

  • Each character has 4 different types of follower units to build a team for the challenge

  • 33 skills

  • Unique special talents to enhance the corresponding character and assist in the challenge

  • 160 cards, 40 artifacts, and 22 types of elixirs, 30 Kinds of Mental Methods

  • 4 levels of game difficulty

  • 45 monsters with different characteristics

  • There are three characters in the game, namely, Crazy Blade, Talisman Master, and Onmyoji (in production). The characters have different cards, skills, servants, and characteristics. Choose your favorite character to start your journey to immortality.

  • As your journey to immortality progresses, gradually expand and form your current card deck. Each card has its effect and the spiritual power it consumes, so please choose carefully.

  • Each card can be strengthened, and strengthening can enhance the attributes of the card. Take advantage of the occasional strengthening opportunity. Some card characteristics can also affect the protagonist, and even obtain exclusive card skills.

  • After each battle, three level portals will appear randomly. Each level icon corresponds to the type of level you are about to enter.

  • In addition to the levels of ordinary monsters and elite monsters, there are other types, such as shops, reinforcements, etc. Please choose the level you want to enter carefully, which will affect your subsequent level-breaking journey.

  • Spiritual pills and magical instruments are essential aids for every immortal cultivator, and the same is true here. Each elixir and magical instrument has its own unique effect.

  • Elixir can restore health in battle, and some can increase damage. Proper use can turn the situation around.

  • Magic instruments are like a piece of equipment. The attribute effects can be superimposed. A good combination can produce unexpected effects

  • Each character has four types of servants. Each servant has two skills. The characteristics of the servants are also different. How to configure the team is also a strategy.

  • More game content is waiting for you to experience this journey to immortality.

short_description: "Fengdu Chronicles of battle" is a roguelike game that combines auto chess and card building. The use of cards will directly affect the battle situation. Collect different cards, elixirs and magic tools in battles, combine your own strategy and complete this journey to become an immortal.
supported_languages: English, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
